objects.src: <svg width='1080' height='1080' viewBox='0 0 1080 1080' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'><defs><linearGradient id='bgGradient' x1='0%' y1='0%' x2='100%' y2='100%'><stop offset='0%' stop-color='#E1F5FE'/><stop offset='100%' stop-color='#B3E5FC'/></linearGradient><radialGradient id='circleGradient' cx='50%' cy='50%' r='50%'><stop offset='0%' stop-color='#FFFFFF'/><stop offset='100%' stop-color='#E1F5FE'/></radialGradient><radialGradient id='priceGradient' cx='50%' cy='50%' r='60%'><stop offset='0%' stop-color='#4FC3F7'/><stop offset='100%' stop-color='#0288D1'/></radialGradient></defs><rect width='1080' height='1080' fill='url(#bgGradient)'/><circle cx='540' cy='540' r='300' fill='url(#circleGradient)' stroke='#FFFFFF' stroke-width='5'/><circle cx='840' cy='400' r='120' fill='url(#priceGradient)' stroke='#FFFFFF' stroke-width='3'/><g opacity='0.2'><circle cx='150' cy='250' r='15' fill='#0288D1'/><circle cx='900' cy='200' r='10' fill='#0288D1'/><circle cx='750' cy='150' r='8' fill='#0288D1'/><circle cx='200' cy='800' r='12' fill='#0288D1'/><circle cx='850' cy='750' r='20' fill='#0288D1'/><circle cx='150' cy='650' r='18' fill='#0288D1'/></g><g opacity='0.1'><path d='M300 150 Q 400 50, 500 150 Q 600 250, 700 150' stroke='#0288D1' stroke-width='3' fill='none'/><path d='M800 850 Q 700 750, 600 850 Q 500 950, 400 850' stroke='#0288D1' stroke-width='3' fill='none'/><path d='M200 300 Q 300 200, 400 300' stroke='#0288D1' stroke-width='2' fill='none'/><path d='M700 700 Q 800 600, 900 700' stroke='#0288D1' stroke-width='2' fill='none'/></g><circle cx='540' cy='540' r='320' fill='none' stroke='#FFFFFF' stroke-width='2' stroke-dasharray='5,5'/></svg>

product_details.description: Note: The adapter is stored inside the air purifier; Power Adapter(Input): 100-240V 50/60 H Rated Power: 7W Noise Level: 25-44dB Dimension: 6.5 × 6.5 × 10.4 inch. 𝗥𝗘𝗠𝗢𝗩𝗘 𝗣𝗢𝗟𝗟𝗨𝗧𝗔𝗡𝗧𝗦 𝗘𝗩𝗘𝗥𝗬𝗪𝗛𝗘𝗥𝗘: Our Pre-Filter and Main Filter capture lint, hair, pet dander, fine airborne pollutants, and smoke particles, helping achieve a cleaner environment for you 𝗛𝗘𝗟𝗣 𝗠𝗔𝗞𝗘 𝗢𝗗𝗢𝗥𝗦 𝗢𝗗𝗢𝗥𝗟𝗘𝗦𝗦: The Activated Carbon Filter helps neutralize smoke, odors, and fumes. You’ll love the feeling of breathing deeply at home 𝗨𝗦𝗘 𝗜𝗧 𝗔𝗡𝗬𝗪𝗛𝗘𝗥𝗘: With the Levoit Core Mini-P air purifiers for home, focus on your activities in the bedroom, kitchen, or office. It offers an auto-off display for uninterrupted sleep and calming aromatherapy #𝟭 𝗔𝗜𝗥 𝗣𝗨𝗥𝗜𝗙𝗜𝗘𝗥 𝗕𝗥𝗔𝗡𝗗: Levoit has sold over 6.5 million products worldwide, is available in 35 countries and regions, and has been a pioneer in air purification technology for 6 years 𝗚𝗘𝗡𝗨𝗜𝗡𝗘 𝗟𝗘𝗩𝗢𝗜𝗧 𝗙𝗜𝗟𝗧𝗘𝗥𝗦: Only use genuine Levoit replacement parts to maintain the best performance (Search for Core Mini-RF). Off-brand filters are inconsistent, unreliable, and may damage the air purifier 𝗡𝗢𝗧𝗘: Our products are manufactured in both Vietnam and China, so you may receive a machine made in either Vietnam or China Color - White ** Brand - LEVOIT ** Product Dimensions - 6.5"D x 6.5"W x 10.4"H ** Floor Area - 337 Square Feet ** Specification Met - ETL Certified **

banner_details:
The banner showcases a modern and clean aesthetic promoting a premium air purifier. It features a soft, diagonal gradient background with subtle wave illustrations and translucent dots for a fresh, airy look. A central circle draws attention to the product image (`product_image`), which is sleek and prominently placed in the middle. Above the image, the main headline (`heading`) uses bold typography in blue, while a secondary subheading (`subheading`) follows in a more refined, dark gray font. A price tag (`price`) is displayed in a vibrant blue circular badge. Below the product are key features (`description`) in a horizontal layout and a noticeable call-to-action button composed of `cta_background` and `cta` text.

**Color Palette:**
- Light Sky Blue: `#E1F5FE`
- Soft Aqua: `#B3E5FC`
- Pure White: `#FFFFFF`
- Azure Blue: `#0288D1`
- Sky Blue: `#4FC3F7`
- Charcoal Gray: `#424242`
product_color: The product image of this Levoit air purifier exhibits a clean, minimalistic color palette that emphasizes modernity and sophistication. The dominant color is a crisp Pure White (#FFFFFF), used across the body of the device, communicating cleanliness and simplicity. The top fan section features a rich Charcoal Gray (#4A4A4A), adding contrast and depth while signifying technological elegance. The Levoit logo and control panel use Light Gray (#B0B0B0) and subtle Blue (#3DAEFF) for accent lighting, lending a futuristic appeal. These colors are well-blended with smooth gradients and shadows, making each element distinct yet cohesive—ideal for a sleek and professional ad design.
